sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO T07_CASE_STCR_KY (APPLICATION_NUM, PARTY_ID, STCR, STATUS, TFRANS_COUNT,CASE_DATE,ACCT_NUM,PARTY_CLASS_CD,PARTY_STATUS,ACCT_STATUS) values( #application_num#, #party_id#,#stcr#, #status#, #tfrans_count#,#case_date#,'',#party_class_cd#,'1','1')

INSERT INTO T07_CASE_STCR_KY (APPLICATION_NUM, PARTY_ID, STCR, STATUS, TFRANS_COUNT,CASE_DATE,ACCT_NUM,PARTY_CLASS_CD,PARTY_STATUS,ACCT_STATUS) SELECT DISTINCT #application_num#, party_id,A.stcr, #status#, #tfrans_count#,#case_date#,A.ACCT_NUM,#party_class_cd#,'1','1' FROM T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_KY A WHERE A.APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num#

INSERT INTO T07_CASE_STCR_DE (APPLICATION_NUM, PARTY_ID, STCR, STATUS, TFRANS_COUNT,CASE_DATE,ACCT_NUM,PARTY_CLASS_CD,PARTY_STATUS,ACCT_STATUS) SELECT DISTINCT #application_num#, party_id,#stcr#, #status#, #tfrans_count#,#case_date#,A.ACCT_NUM,#party_class_cd#,'1','1' FROM T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE A WHERE A.APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num#
